text:
I never met my grandma. She passed away in 1977.

But AI helped me see her moving:

✦ I uploaded a black & white picture from 1963.
✦ I asked Gemini first to naturally restore it.
✦ I then asked Gemini (again) to animate it.

For the full guide (with prompts to copy & paste, and the necessary links to the tools), go to this website: https://lnkd.in/dtePiWa4.

It's a completely free AI guide I wrote this morning.

To access all of my archives, go to https://lnkd.in/dDhmdQPj or https://lnkd.in/dSj2SU9Z (it has more guides).
